content: {"name": "Farmers Market Dollar Program", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Dispenses $15 to Riverdale Park families receiving SNAP and $25 to Riverdale Park families not receiving SNAP while funds last.Applications can also be submitted via email at development@riverdaleparkmd.gov,by phone at 301-927-6381 or mailed to 5008 Queensbury Road Riverdale Park. Applications are available for download here.  Farmers Market Dollars will be sent to applicants by mail with an allotment for the entire month.The market is held at 4650 Queensbury Road and is open for use by the general public from 4-7pm.Proof of Riverdale Park residency is required.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.riverdaleparkmd.info/how_do_i/apply_for/farmers_market_dollars_.php", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4650 Queensbury Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Riverdale Park", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "20737", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.9626759, "longitude": -76.9352667}, "phones": [{"number": "(301) 927-6381", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "00:00"}]}
